title: Express Uptimer
description: Uptimer you can host yourself to keep your websites online!

title: Discord Bot CDN
description: Use a discord bot to upload files to discord and share them with anyone you like!

title: Markdown HTML Webserver
description: Host markdown files as html pages using a webserver.

title: Youtube Playlist Player
description: Play YouTube playlists and videos in a scuffed Spotify UI.

title: Mark's Food Place
description: A restaurant game about filling orders while your balance constantly gets lowered. Winner of MarkJam 5.

title: Mark's Knight
description: An infinite dungeon game about fighting corrupted version of mark using your sword and bombs! Winner of MarkJam 4.

title: Atom One Dark for Replit.com
description: The popular Visual Studio Code theme ported to replit.com

title: Golf Course
description: Play minigolf in this pixel art browser game.

title: Replit Profile Viewer
description: Alternative profile page for Replit users. Get repls, roles and languages from users using Replit's GraphQL API.
